display_name: Minimum level of oxygen saturation (nadir) in estimated sleep duration  from type III home sleep apnea test
description: "Nadir" refers to the lowest oxygen saturation reading. Estimated sleep duration, providing an approximation of total sleep duration (i.e. total sleep time) inferred from analysis of non-EEG channels [Zhao et al., 2017 (PMID:27707441)]( https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5181603/)
